title: 2 Easy Ways to Send and Share Multiple Photos on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. This looks like a green phone icon with a white background. If you aren't already logged into the WhatsApp app, enter your phone number and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap a chat or group chat.
steps.content: Tap a chat or group chat. You can find this in the Chat tab.

steps.title: Tap + .
steps.content: Tap + . This is at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Tap Photos.
steps.content: Tap Photos . You can find this in the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap a photo.
steps.content: Tap a photo. You can browse your phone's gallery or camera roll . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap + again.
steps.content: Tap + again. This is in the text field.

steps.title: Select additional photos.
steps.content: Select additional photos. This is where you can select more than one photo.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . The photos will display in the text field.

steps.title: Tap Send.
steps.content: Tap Send . This may also look like an airplane icon. The photos will be sent to the recipient.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. You can download the WhatsApp desktop application to your Windows or Mac computer, or use WhatsApp in a browser at https://web.whatsapp.com/ .

steps.title: Click a chat or group chat.
steps.content: Click a chat or group chat. You can find this in the Chat tab.

steps.title: Click + .
steps.content: Click + . This is at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Click Photos & Videos.
steps.content: Click Photos & Videos . A new window will open where you can select the photos you want.You can send up to 100 photos at once. To select multiple photos, hold Ctrl or Cmd as you click. You can also drag and drop the photos directly into the text field.

steps.title: Click the airplane icon.
steps.content: Click the airplane icon. This will send your photos to the recipient.
